birth_context.metadata: 1920s: Karachi felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside rapid urban migration and bureaucratic expansion; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and jointâ€‘family ties, exam culture, and jugaad improvisation.

formative_context.metadata: 1920s: Melbourne felt interwar modernization, mass culture, and uneven prosperity alongside stable democracies with multicultural inflows; locals commonly emphasized frugality or new consumer tastes, family obligation, and neighborhood reciprocity and sporting camaraderie and egalitarian manners.

current_socio_demographics.societal_perceptions: as a male immigrant navigating post-colonial transitions, expected to suppress vulnerability; stigma around mental health persists

presenting_problem.summary: adjustment difficulties and depressive symptoms following forced migration
